text: Bucklen Theatre, also known as the Elkhart Opera House, was a historic theatre located at Elkhart, Elkhart County, Indiana. It was built in 1883, and was a three-story, five bay, red brick building. Note: This includes and Accompanying photographs. It was demolished in 1986.Cinema Treasures It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1976 and delisted in 1986. ==References== Category:Former National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Theatres on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Theatres completed in 1883 Category:Buildings and structures in Elkhart, Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Elkhart County, Indiana Category:Demolished buildings and structures in Indiana Category:Buildings and structures demolished in 1986
title: Bucklen Theatre
